Import.Hint1: You may import {document} data into this pack from an exported JSON file.
Import.Hint2: This data should be exported from DnD5e using the conversion tool.

Remapping.Hint: Replace UUIDs found in imported content with links to different compendiums. This process will replace the compendium portion of the link, but will not modify the ID or remap to BFRD content.
Remapping.Title: Compendium Pack Remapping

Import.Title: Importer
